Ultipedia:AI edition is artificial intelligence to help you study.Ask him to define or explain everything from advanced science to simple grammar.We have fed him with all knowledge academic.He also talks back but you can shut him up if you so wish.To get started ask him \"Tell me about newton\". Have fun studying.
